i1.name: More Sparkles!
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} After casting an [[champion ability|ability]], '''Zoe's''' next [[basic attack]] within 5 seconds won't use a {{tip|projectile}} and deals {{pp|16;20;24;28;32;36;42;48;54;60;66;74;82;90 to 130|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}.

q1.name: Paddle Star
description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Zoe''' shoots a ''star'' in the target direction that collides with the first enemy hit, dealing {{as|magic damage}} in a small area, reduced to 80% to enemies hit beyond the first. The ''total'' damage is increased by {{pp|7|type=distance traveled|key=%|0 to 150|800;950;1350;1650;1950;2250;2550}}.
If the ''star'' does not hit an enemy, it lingers at maximum range for 1 second.

{{sbc|Second Cast:}} While the ''star'' is out, '''Zoe''' can reactivate ''Paddle Star'' to redirect it to a new location near her, resetting its damage modifier on cast. The redirected ''star'' can travel beyond the new target location, continuing forward until it moves more than 800 units from '''Zoe'''.
q1.notes:
* At max rank and max level, the ability deals between 200 {{as|(+ 60% AP)}} and 500 {{as|(+ 150% AP)}} magic damage, based on distance.
* The secondary radius matches the initial maximum range of the ability, but '''Zoe''' can move any amount of distance away from the projectile before reactivating.

effects.str:
• Minimum Magic Damage: 7 ‒ 50 (+ ) (+ 60% AP)
  • Maximum Magic Damage: 17.5 ‒ 125 (+ ) (+ 150% AP)

w1.name: Spell Thief
description: {{sbc|Passive - Spell Thief:}} Whenever enemy champions cast a {{ccib|Summoner spell icon.png|summoner spell}} or {{ccib|Active ability item icon.png|Active ability items|item active}}, they drop the corresponding ''{{as|{{ccib|Spell Thief Minimap.png||Spell Shard}}|armor}}'' onto the ground that grants {{tip|sight}} over a 100-radius area and remains for 40 seconds. Some enemy {{tip|minions}} spawn with random ''{{as|Spell Shards|armor}}'' that only drop to the ground for 20 seconds if killed by '''Zoe'''.

Collecting a ''{{as|Spell Shard|armor}}'' allows '''Zoe''' to activate ''Spell Thief'' within the next 60 seconds. She can replace her current ''Spell Thief'' active by moving directly onto another ''{{as|Spell Shard|armor}}''.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Zoe''' mimics the active of the collected ''{{as|Spell Shard|armor}}''.

{{sbc|Passive - Wheeeee:}} Casting ''Spell Thief'' or one of her own summoner spells grants '''Zoe''' {{sti|ms|{{As|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for the next few seconds, and summons three bubbles that orbit her for the next 10 seconds. The bubbles autonomously hurl themselves at the nearest enemy in range, prioritizing her attack target, dealing {{as|magic damage}}.
w1.notes:
* Mimics the details of the mimicked active.
* Minions that can drop ''{{as|Spell Shards|armor}}'' are marked with a tied cosmic balloon that floats above them.
** Minions do not drop a shard for {{ii|Hextech Gunblade}} or {{si|Teleport}}.
* '''Zoe''' utilizes an attack-like animation whenever one of the bubbles hurls itself at an enemy, making it look as if she can attack while moving.
* '''Zoe''' cannot steal [[Consumable item]]s, [[Trinket]]s, [[Item#Classification|component]] items, or items that create deployable or persistent effects. Some actives are excluded for balance purposes. The following list was last checked November 8th.<ref>[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I4u0eOkzQHs Spell Thief list]</ref>:
{{Zoe Spell Thief list}}

e1.name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zoe''' kicks a ''bubble'' in the target direction that bursts on the first enemy hit, else forming a [[trap]] at maximum range for 5 seconds that arms after {{fd|0.8}} seconds. The ''bubble'' can only move through terrain once but may do so indefinitely, can only move up to 650 units once outside terrain, and will fall short if it would enter terrain again.

The ''bubble'' deals {{as|magic damage}} on contact with an enemy and renders them {{tip|drowsy}} for {{fd|1.4}} seconds, which gradually {{tip|slow|slows}} them, after which they fall {{tip|sleep|asleep}} for {{fd|2.25}} seconds.

The next [[dot|non-dot]] champion or turret damage taken by the {{tip|sleep|sleeping}} target deals {{tip|true damage|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}} equal to the [[Damage modifier|post-mitigation]] damage dealt, capped at ''Sleepy Trouble Bubble's'' damage. The '''bonus''' damage is dealt before the triggering damage.
e1.notes:
* [[Spell shield]]s will fully block the ''bubble'' projectile but will not when it becomes a ''trap''. Stepping on it will only block the ''drowsy'' debuff, without blocking the damage.
* Activating a spell shield while being ''drowsy'' will not block the ''falling asleep'' debuff.
* Removing the {{tip|Drowsy}} effect prevents the target from falling {{tip|sleep|asleep}}.
* If exceptionally close to terrain, the ball will pass through without detection and will still be able to pass through a second piece of terrain - although it sacrifices any range its already used going through the first piece.

effects.str:
• Maximum Slow: %

  • Magic Damage: (+ 40% AP)

r1.name: Portal Jump
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a brief delay, '''Zoe''' dives into a portal that she opens beneath her, {{tip|blink|blinking}} to the target location.
'''Zoe''' remains able to attack and cast abilities during ''Portal Jump'', and can {{tip|sight|see}} over walls, but is unable to move. After 1 second, she blinks back to her cast location.
r1.notes:
* '''Zoe''' will always blink back to her original location, even if she is {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} or killed.
*'''Zoe's''' movement speed is set to 0 during the duration of the portal, but she is not considered {{tip|root|rooted}}, which allows her to use movement spells and items such as {{si|Flash}} or {{ii|Hextech Protobelt-01}}.
* Upon reaching her destination, Zoe will either raspberry at the nearest enemy champion, or lick an ice cream cone when there are no enemy champions in sight.
